trans-unit.source: Sunburst (This comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
trans-unit.target: 辉映（用过几种颜色的法术力来支付其费用，它进场时上面便有几个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.source: As the fifth sun joins the other four, new abilities awaken in the creatures of Mirrodin.
trans-unit.target: 绿阳诞生，五辉齐耀，唤醒秘罗地众生之潜能。

trans-unit.source: Synod Centurion
trans-unit.target: 悉诺议会百夫长

trans-unit.source: When you control no other artifacts, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当你未操控其它神器时，牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: "We order them to stand, they stand. We order them to wait, they wait. We order them to die, they die."\n—Pontifex, elder researcher
trans-unit.target: 「要它们站，它们就站；要它们等，它们就等；要它们死，它们就死。」 ～大学者庞棣飞

trans-unit.source: Thermal Navigator
trans-unit.target: 热能导航机

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice an artifact: CARDNAME gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个神器：CARDNAME获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: It takes off with a roar of superheated wind, startling wild pterons as they survey the ground below.
trans-unit.target: 起飞时扬起炙风巨响，惊走俯瞰地景的野生翼兽。

trans-unit.source: Vedalken Orrery
trans-unit.target: 维多肯星像仪

trans-unit.source: You may play nonland cards any time you could play an instant.
trans-unit.target: 你可以于你能够使用瞬间的时机下，使用不是地的牌。

trans-unit.source: The model incorporated the fifth sun effortlessly, as if it had always known.
trans-unit.target: 此模型将第五太阳顺势纳入，彷佛设计时早已预见。

trans-unit.source: Vedalken Shackles
trans-unit.target: 维多肯枷锁

trans-unit.source: You may choose not to untap CARDNAME during your untap step.
trans-unit.target: 你可选择于你的重置步骤中不重置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of Islands you control as long as CARDNAME remains tapped.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：选择目标力量小于或等于由你操控之海岛数量的生物。只要CARDNAME持续被横置，你便获得目标生物的操控权。

trans-unit.source: Wayfarer's Bauble
trans-unit.target: 旅人饰品

trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，并将之横置进场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: It is the forest beyond the horizon, the mountain waiting to be climbed, the new land across the endless sea.
trans-unit.target: 这是地平线远处的树林，尚待征服的山脉，无尽汪洋彼端的新大地。
